title: How to Remove Mineral Deposits from Stainless Steel Cookware
description:
Does your stainless steel cookware look dull from all the mineral deposits that have accumulated over time?

There is no need for harsh chemicals! Just dab a kitchen towel and wipe your pan down with white vinegar to restore your stainless steel pots and pans back to their original luster.

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
Does your stainless steel cookware look dull from all the mineral deposits that have accumulated over time?

There is no need for harsh chemicals! Just dab a kitchen towel and wipe your pan down with white vinegar to restore your stainless steel pots and pans back to their original luster.
